title: Sewing Machine Operator
desc: Operates sewing machines to stitch garments or fabric products in manufacturing units.

title: Primary School Teacher
desc: Teaches foundational subjects to young students and supports classroom activities.

title: Mason
desc: Builds and repairs structures using bricks, stones and concrete blocks.

title: Motorcycle Mechanic
desc: Repairs and maintains motorcycles and scooters.

title: Call Centre Agent
desc: Handles inbound and outbound calls to assist customers.
